projects

Honilands primary school

Honilands primary school ladies staff WC Refurbishment April 2018 Brief was to turn a very unloved ladies staff WC into a modern “nightclub” feel WC area but keeping it still suitable for a school environment.

We fully stripped out all services(plumbing and electrics) and all flooring, ceiling and cubicles and vanity unit.

We rewired and re-plumbed to suit the new layout and cubicle system.

The brick walls were plastered and fully decorated. We boxed in heating pipes above the door to maintain nice clean lines throughout the room.

New polysafe Safety Flooring was fitted. A new suspended ceiling along with new PIR controlled lights and 3 new extract fans were installed.

New Venesta washroom cubicles and IPS and vanity unit along with new Sanitaryware and brassware were supplied and installed by us.

New handryers and splash back and a large mirror complemented the fit out.

We were on a tight budget but achieved the schools project description.
